items.name: accordion
items.title: Accordion
items.description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that reveal content.

items.name: aspect-ratio
items.title: Aspect Ratio
items.description: Displays content within a desired ratio.

items.name: avatar
items.title: Avatar
items.description: An image element with a fallback for representing the user.

items.name: badge
items.title: Badge
items.description: Displays a badge or a component that looks like a badge.

items.name: breadcrumb
items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: Displays the path to the current resource using a hierarchy of links.

items.name: button
items.title: Button
items.description: Displays a button or a component that looks like a button.

items.name: calendar
items.title: Calendar
items.description: A date field component that allows users to enter and edit date.

items.name: callout
items.title: Callout
items.description: Displays important messages with severity variants.

items.name: card
items.title: Card
items.description: Displays a card with header, content, and footer.

items.name: carousel
items.title: Carousel
items.description: A carousel with motion and swipe built using Embla.

items.name: checkbox
items.title: Checkbox
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.

items.name: collapsible
items.title: Collapsible
items.description: An interactive component which expands/collapses a panel.

items.name: command
items.title: Command
items.description: Fast, composable, unstyled command menu for React.

items.name: context-menu
items.title: Context Menu
items.description: Displays a menu located at the pointer, triggered by a right-click.

items.name: dialog
items.title: Dialog
items.description: A window overlaid on either the primary window or another dialog window.

items.name: dropdown-menu
items.title: Dropdown Menu
items.description: Displays a menu to the user triggered by a button.

items.name: drawer
items.title: Drawer
items.description: A drawer component for React.

items.name: form
items.title: Form
items.description: Building forms with React Hook Form and Zod.

items.name: hover-card
items.title: Hover Card
items.description: For sighted users to preview content available behind a link.

items.name: input
items.title: Input
items.description: Displays a form input field or a component that looks like an input field.

items.name: input-otp
items.title: Input OTP
items.description: Accessible one-time password component with copy paste functionality.

items.name: label
items.title: Label
items.description: Renders an accessible label associated with controls.

items.name: menubar
items.title: Menubar
items.description: A visually persistent menu common in desktop applications.

items.name: navigation-menu
items.title: Navigation Menu
items.description: A collection of links for navigating websites.

items.name: pagination
items.title: Pagination
items.description: Pagination with page navigation, next and previous links.

items.name: popover
items.title: Popover
items.description: Displays rich content in a portal, triggered by a button.

items.name: progress
items.title: Progress
items.description: Displays an indicator showing the completion progress of a task.

items.name: radio-group
items.title: Radio Group
items.description: A set of checkable buttons where no more than one can be checked at a time.

items.name: resizable
items.title: Resizable
items.description: Accessible resizable panel groups and layouts with keyboard support.

items.name: scroll-area
items.title: Scroll Area
items.description: Augments native scroll functionality for custom, cross-browser styling.

items.name: select
items.title: Select
items.description: Displays a list of options for the user to pick from.

items.name: separator
items.title: Separator
items.description: Visually or semantically separates content.

items.name: sheet
items.title: Sheet
items.description: Extends the Dialog component to display content that complements the main content of the screen.

items.name: skeleton
items.title: Skeleton
items.description: Use to show a placeholder while content is loading.

items.name: slider
items.title: Slider
items.description: An input where the user selects a value from within a given range.

items.name: sonner
items.title: Sonner
items.description: An opinionated toast component for React.

items.name: spinner
items.title: Spinner
items.description: A loading spinner with size and variant options.

items.name: status-badge
items.title: Status Badge
items.description: A versatile badge component for displaying status indicators with various states and sizes.

items.name: switch
items.title: Switch
items.description: A control that allows the user to toggle between on and off.

items.name: table
items.title: Table
items.description: A responsive table component.

items.name: tabs
items.title: Tabs
items.description: A set of layered sections of content displayed one at a time.

items.name: textarea
items.title: Textarea
items.description: Displays a form textarea or a component that looks like a textarea.

items.name: toggle
items.title: Toggle
items.description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.

items.name: toggle-group
items.title: Toggle Group
items.description: A set of two-state buttons that can be toggled on or off.

items.name: tooltip
items.title: Tooltip
items.description: A popup that displays information related to an element.

items.name: kbd
items.title: Kbd
items.description: Displays keyboard keys or shortcuts.

items.name: empty
items.title: Empty
items.description: Empty state placeholder for when there is no data to display.

items.name: typography
items.title: Typography
items.description: Styles for headings, paragraphs, and other text elements.
